Detailed Description

Provides an UibActionAccessor based on Actions. One Action represents one menu-item, hence every menu-item can have a text, an icon and may be enabled/disabled. When triggering a menu-item, the Action representing the item will be executed.
See also:
Action

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.
